tweets.text: Today we are closing our London offices after almost a quarter of a century. Thank you, London for being such a gracious host! https://t.co/R8LXjfzvp3 https://t.co/8abqMcbROJ
EMA recommended granting a conditional marketing authorisation for the first treatment for a rare disease characterised by high levels of #triglycerides in blood: https://t.co/8DqmtHo7qk #CHMP
EMA‚Äôs human medicines committee recommends 8 #medicines for approval at its February 2019 meeting https://t.co/VCEdeqiAar #CHMP https://t.co/0Z1cCNfkng

#EMA supports #RareDiseaseDay every day! Our Committee for Orphan Medicinal Products is the only committee fully dedicated to medicines for rare diseases. #ShowYourRare https://t.co/uNumz8tDDX https://t.co/heMlVfyYnm
EU and Switzerland to improve information-sharing on good manufacturing practice through the use of the #EudraGMDP database: https://t.co/0bfzKOvdok #EMA #Swissmedic

Today, EMA staff lowered the 28 EU flags and symbolically said goodbye to their London offices. Guido Rasi expressed his thanks to the UK for its contribution to the work of the Agency and for having been a gracious host of EMA since 1995. https://t.co/KpsBvaXt42
EMA and the European Commission have published updated guidance to help pharmaceutical companies prepare for Brexit: https://t.co/eT5xYFkiZk https://t.co/tVY6BzhCeC

What is the role of #BigData for the evaluation and supervision of #medicines in the EU? Read the summary report from the #HMA - #EMA joint task force and join the discussion by providing your feedback on the recommendations: https://t.co/4dxc5xY3C2 https://t.co/RN9Fj3P7S1

New safety features for #medicines sold in the EU: a unique identifier and an anti-tampering device on medicines packaging to help protect EU citizens against the threat of #FalsifiedMedicines: https://t.co/HOHtFNmfFp #PatientSafety https://t.co/mEufeswUnl
In January, EMA reviewed 7 recommendations for eligibility to #PRIME: 1 was granted and 6 were denied. See more here: https://t.co/WTOLUCnQ8l https://t.co/kVAOLuZmCt
See what's on the agenda of the January meeting of EMA‚Äôs human #medicines committee: https://t.co/QlHKo3ejrh #CHMP
